import React from 'react' class PostCard extends React.Component { constructor(){ super() this.CopyToClipboard = this.CopyToClipboard.bind(this) } CopyToClipboard(btn, id) { /* Get the text field */ var copyText = document.getElementById(id); document.getElementById(btn.id).innerHTML = 'Copiado!'; this.disabled = true; /* Select the text field */ copyText.select(); /* Copy the text inside the text field */ document.execCommand("copy"); } render(){ const image_url = "http://my.gerar.me/storage/app/images/Posts/"+this.props.post.image_url const download_url = "http://my.gerar.me/posts/download/"+this.props.post.id return (
  • {this.props.post.headline}
